post.body: re: Kanye - that's what I thought, too
you're welcome!
"tower," even ... :-)
very cool Trump Twoer video - thanks!
- RT @vaspersthegrate: Comcast delivers help to consumers online via Twitter.
those ARE cool - gotta love the ON/OFF and the one with the biscuit holder
Oy! Literal me ... :-)
to be even more specific, gaggle describes a group of geese in flight - a group of geese on the ground is a skein
I don't think there's a number assigned to gaggle - it's most commonly used as a descriptor for a group of geese.
who arrrrre you, anyway? ... ;-)
Jameson's & hot chocolate? I am sooo there!!! Heh!
thanks for the 411 about Dr. John's album - well-deserved, IMO
very, very cool about your song on KPFT!!!
I'm not really thrilled about the selection of Rick Warren. My apolitical wife is bothered, too
man, oh man, that pic of the Jack Russell makes my face hurt, too ... Yeeeow!!!
I nominate @peggyolson for a Shorty Award in #advertising because she's miles ahead of most of the men at Sterling Cooper.
my Internet connection was so bad for a while that Cox gave me a month for free - go for it!
you don't HAVE to use iTunes, you can just go to indiefeed.com and look for the blues channel.
IndieFeed.com has a variety of short, small-bite genre shows - you can find them all in iTunes - blues among them ... :-)
so if I give you a bottle of Mogen David, you'll give me a bottle of Wild Turkey? ... ;-)
I haven't mentioned at the saloon yet, but I'm also now doing the IndieFeed.com Blues show ... :-)
I'm glad you like it!
It's a darn good thing we own "Christmas Story" - I won't lose any sleep, although I *am* tempted to watch a little ... :-)
local reporting has come to suck because, much of the time, tyros are hired to do it.
In the case of the Wiesenthal foundation, it's a tragic example of misplaced trust.
In deference to your "no more moping" request, I am now humming REM's "Shiny, Happy People"
It gets better: I'm gonna see Ray Wylie Hubbard in a club that seats just 150 on Friday night. And THAT show is just $20.
and the Lips are charging just $20 per ticket! Can't beat it!
Hey, tell Mean Gene I said, "Howdy!" ... :-)
HNY to you, too!!!
I've met and talked with Burris, and he is VERY ambitious.
time for some shut-eye ... g'night, Twits!
Is it unreasonable to expect Barnes & Noble physical stores to sell stuff (The Dark Knight in particular) for the online price? Discuss ...
Is beginning to detest Twitter-based neologisms that start (naturally) with "tw" - they smack of "insiderism," for one thing ...
my source: http://tinyurl.com/4vk225 (I already knew abou crows and geese, amused by the ducks term)
FWIW, one name for a group of crows is - a murder of crows. And ducks in flight are a plump (yes, plump) of ducks
Just took my 6th mugshot! http://www.dailymugshot.com/main/show/10741
Outdoor Xmas decorations DONE!!! *wild applause*
Going to see the Boss' students do "The Curious Savage" - later, Twits!
Man, oh man, Watermelon Slim is a fun interview ... time for more coffee!
Just took my 11th mugshot! http://www.dailymugshot.com/main/show/10741
I've had (for me) a very busy morning - made chili 4 dinner, arranged four interviews and did an IndieFeed Blues episode - phew!
Just took my 10th mugshot! http://www.dailymugshot.com/main/show/10741
Ooops! And now, because I didn't DM, you all know I'm the new voice of IndieFeed Blues ... :-)
Just took my 9th mugshot! http://www.dailymugshot.com/main/show/10741
Now being followed by someone with "nothappy" in their Twitter handle, 1500+ follows, 50 friends and 3 tweets. I should follow back why?
Just took my 8th mugshot! http://www.dailymugshot.com/main/show/10741
Good morning, Twits! For those of you who mighta missed it: a new Murphy's Saloon - http://rubyurl.com/IiP1
hi-ho, hi-ho ... later, Twits!
and it is ONLY iPhones - Blackberrys work w/o creating problems. There are baskets fir iPhones in Nashville studio lobbies.
a dirty little secret : when in a recording studio, iPhones emit a tone that interferes with recording - hence, they are banned.
I'm really, REALLY looking forward to the Ray Wylie Hubbard show tonight - Dustin Welch and Liz & Lincoln opening ...
Just learned that one of Bernard Madoff's victims is the Simon Wiesenthal Foundation - almost all $$ assets GONE!!
Very quiet day so far - getting ready to take down holiday decorations.
Looking for the coffee IV ...
I think I posted something like this earlier, but what the hell: Happy New Year to you, my Twitter pals!!
I'm feeling pretty grumpy this a.m. - but hope all you Tweeters have a Great NYE!
Internships: short-term slavery in exchange for the mere *possibility* of a real job ...
I'll take bets that when consolidation of new media occurs, it will leave just a lifeboat-full of writers making a living wage.
Dancing Santas and confetti cannons are part of my evening plans - yep, gonna see the Flaming Lips!!!
